name: Shorten Link Creator
author: GÃ¶khan KARA

sections.description:
Shorten Link Creator
Bit.ly Quick Link Abbreviation Extension

http://bit.ly Api Fast Shorten Link Creator.
You can create a quick link with the system through the short code API key.

Plugin setup, settings video tutorial
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bqK6r2d-I4

Footnote *
Only the administrator can see this builder. Visitors can not see.

With this add-on you can shorten the links of all the content pages on your site.
Please use the following steps carefully to use the plug-in without any problems.

With just 4 steps you can shorten your links immediately!

  1. Process * Create Api Key
  2. Process * Enter Information Panel
  3. Process * Activate Widget
  4. Process * Shorten your links freely!

Support

Suppport : http://www.gokhankara.net/contact or gkdesigned@gmail.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/Shorten-Link-Creator’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->SLink Creator screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
  5. Plugin setup, settings video tutorial : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bqK6r2d-I4
  6. Docs : http://blog.gokhankara.net/wordpress-icin-bit-ly-link-kisaltma-eklentisi/
sections.faq:
There is a panel usage and settings ?

Yes. You can examine and use the settings from the panel. URL : admin.php?page=shortenlinkcreator

The API system for which the information is required ?

Yes, it works in an integrated manner with the bit.ly API.
